text: The Franklinâ€“Orleans Street Bridge, commonly known as the Franklin Street Bridge, is a bascule bridge over the Chicago River, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. It was built in October 1920, and is located directly southwest of the Merchandise Mart. Connecting the Near North Side with "The Loop,". ==Other websites== Category:Bridges in Chicago Category:1920 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Illinois
